column4: hello everybody    ..... i want install  a jar file java  some body can help me cuz  i have hours trid pliz
mmm so just i need put the file on the java carpet?
you don't install jar files, you execute them with Java.  java -jar file.jar
make sure you have an appropriate version of Java Runtime installed.  unless you know the app was designed to work with the open source Java versions, try using the official Sun Java
